title: Friday Night Live: Week 8 scores, updates and uploads
text:
Friday Night Live: Week 8 scores, updates and uploads Roy Lang III , rflang@gannett.com 4:38 p.m. CDT October 22, 2015 Byrd kicks off Week 8 against Green Oaks on Thursday at Lee Hedges Stadium. (Photo: Henrietta Wildsmith/The Times) 
Byrd helps kickoff Week 8 and Friday Night Live tonight. The Yellow Jackets host Green Oaks at Lee Hedges Stadium on Thursday night, while North DeSoto faces Huntington and North Webster travels to Mansfield. 
Keep up with all the action this week with Friday Night Live. 
Add pictures, comments and updates from local games you attend. Plus, get scores, prep fantasy football updates and social media posts from others. Use the hashtag #TimesFNL. 
Mobile/tablet users click here: WEEK 8 FRIDAY NIGHT LIVE Live Blog Friday Night Live: 2015 Week 8  ; Read or Share this story: http://www.shreveporttimes.com/story/sports/high-school/football/2015/10/22/friday-night-live-week-7-wrapup-scores-uploads/74413786/ TOP VIDEOS
